document_data.name: Mists of Ghaunadaur
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mists of Ghaunadaur''''' was a spell used by [[cleric]]s of [[Ghaunadaur]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the caster was cloaked in a flowing violet mist. The mist effectively rendered the caster invisible. The mist protected the caster from attacks that required sight, and made them invisible to not only natural vision but also [[infravision]] and any abilities that detected heat. The ''[[true seeing]]'' spell was capable of penetrating the mist.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
